node.title: 12-year-old charged with murder after 62-year-old found dead in Northland paddock
node.description: A 15-year-old is already before the courts charged with murder.
node.content: ["Northland Police have now charged a second person in relation to the tragic murder of \u014ckaihau man Michael John Biggins.", "The 62-year-old victim was found in a vehicle crashed into a paddock off Imms Road on the evening of 27 September 2021 and tragically died at the scene.", "A 15-year-old is already before the courts charged with murder.", "Today, Police have jointly charged a 12-year-old with murder in relation to this matter.", "He is expected to appear in the Kaikohe Youth Court today.", "Police continue to support Mr Biggins' family at this extremely difficult time.", "As this matter is before the courts, Police are unable to comment further."]
